reviews.sentence: Wish I could get it back. Everything at the hotel was fantastic but I was overcharged for my room. I was told it was just a holding deposit but I have checked out and still do not have my money back.
The room was next to the highway. It was so noisy I got no sleep at all. The room smelled awfully. I a made comment to the front desk person upon check out she could not cared less.

Nothing is for free. While I enjoyed the trip I felt that certain emenities should be standard. Things such as water microwaves in the rooms and complimentary breakfast. They cut costs in areas where it was not worth it. My family and I will not be staying at a Courtyard again. No complimentary any thing. No soap no lotion no breakfast no anything.

Room decor dated. Had one glass on counter and one lid next to the tray like someone had used the other glass. Made me wonder about what else had been used in the room. Electrical outlets were all loosened would not hold a plug.

Not stay again. Hotel staff pleasant. Horrendous smell in hallway. Sofa was not comfortable to sit on. Pillows are nice but bed mattress was not. Convenience. Smell better mattress lower prices for coffee and breakfast as they are overpriced.

Would visit again. The hotel itself was incredibly clean the bed was so comfortable the staff was amazing and the hotel breakfast is SO good. We definitely enjoyed our stay and will be returning. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because our bathtub was peeling. However they have a sign that states there will be renovations this year so once that happens it will be perfect. We were even allowed to check in early with no questions asked.

Noisy overnight stay. The hotel is next to I10 and the noise was considerable. The room felt damp from the humidity. The noise inside the room came from the running toilet. There were signs up for a pending renovation at the hotel and it needs updating. The staff were very friendly and pleasant. The breakfast bistro service was poor. Way too busy for one person to handle. The food was good but a bit pricey. Good location and I would book again after the renovations are complete.
1 night stay. Stopped for 1 night on the way to Alabama.

The air conditioner in the room never completely cooled. We noticed that the whole hotel was on the warm side actually. The sink was extremely slow draining. Kind of gross when you are brushing your teeth and washing your face and hands. The knob in the shower was a bit wonky. It worked but you had to play with it a minute. The pool was nice but they never had towels stocked. The beds were really comfortable and the staff was extremely nice. I would stay here again if the price were lower. I did not really feel that it was worth what we paid.

Yuck. We have stayed in this hotel before so we booked again. To say this hotel has gone downhill in a year or two is a understatement. I felt like I was going to get something while staying here. The carpet was stained and icky feeling the bathtub enamel was peeling off to the point we showered on a towel so it would n’t cut our feet. The pull out bed mattress was beyond disgusting. This hotel is out of date and needs major improvements. Check in the lady was super nice. Check out the girl was not friendly at all. I did see “ renovation ” plan pictures in the lobby but I will NOT be staying here again.

Great Service by Latoyia and Taylor. The hotel is undergoing renovations ice machines are not working near my room. Latoyia and Taylor both brought ice to my room wo knowing that I have a bad foot. They were Outstanding. I started staying here 6 years ago because of Debie The Cook. The hotels staff is why I stay here even after 6 years. I hope the GM knows how Great his staff is 24x7x365.

Great stay. I checked in early and the ladies in the lobby were wonderful. One was pregnant and just as cheerful and the manager I think Lofton were friendly as well. Polite quick in very nice lobby close to restaurants we walked everywhere we needed. Hotel is being renavated so watch the mess. I did n’t give it a 5 because a housekeeping staff left a note in my room that I did n’t quite understand. I alearted the staff and they stated they would look into it. The housekeeping staff could use some sensitivity and customer service training from the ladies downstairs only on my floor did I speak and ask a question about trash and you would have thought I cursed them very rude and they do n’t speak. Pool is on the inside which I do n’t like cause my kids are noisy but the ladies up front made my stay wonderful. it ’s always a pleasure to come down and see the staff with smiles on their faces remember you by name and the reason you ’re there if you tell them. I recommend this hotel to everyone going to blue bayou football game or whatever. I ’l definitely be staying here again.
The staff were extremely friendly and helpful. It was in a great location. easy on and off access. Clean and comfortable.

Nice hotel and reasonable pricing for a Friday nig. I really liked this hotel. it is right off of the interstate in close proximity to shopping Joes Crab Shack etc. Easy to access very clean and the staff was very friendly. They do not offer free breakfast but have a bar where you can order food beer etc. Room was pretty normal. King size bed with a sleeper sofa. The sofa was not your typical dingy sofa. It was very nice. We did not open it up or sleep on it but it was comfortable to watch tv on. Even had a foot rest to match. I would definitely stay here again.

Terrible Customer Service. Checking in here was a near disaster. We booked on hotelscom and were supposed to get breakfast for 3 as part of the deal. I was handed a voucher for one breakfast and two drinks. I warned the lady at the desk Tiana that my girlfriend who made the reservation was going question the vouchers. When my girlfriend did so Tiana became very hostile loud and argumentative saying that she would not jeopardize her career to fix the problem. Other hotel employees were just standing and sitting around watching it happen. We called Mariot corporate which did nothing but initiate a case file and forwarded it to the manager. I expect more from a company like Mariot. Hotelscom readily agreed to refund the price we paid for the breakfasts. Got to the room and the saga continues. Almost no toilet paper in the bathroom and no spare roles. We tried to use the two drink vouchers at the bar and were told that the bar was closed for the holiday. Well. It is morning and the lies and rudeness continues. When we tried to use the drink vouchers at breakfast which we were told last night we could use at breakfast we were told that we could not use them at breakfast for anything other than coffee or juice which would have been included with breakfast anyway which I would have had to pay for for two additional people. We walked away with coffee and orange juice and no breakfast. So the drink vouchers turned out to be absolutely WORTHLESMy worst hotel experience ever. Is this really what Mariot has become.
I love the front desk staff. They were very accommodating and courteous. I will definitely be returning to this location.

Friendly staff and nice room. The front desk staff was very friendly and the room was nice. I would stay here again. It was close to restaurants and the highway for our trip home the next day. Not sure what else to say just using up the 200 words tripadvisor requires.

Exceptional Stay. My family was planning a gathering in Baton Rouge for an engagement party and I was able to find this courtyard through the Mariot website. This hotel is on Siegen right of the highway with access to many department stores nearby. The hotel beds are awesome we were mostly in Double queen rooms and the beds comfort level is beyond great. Staff is wonderful. I mean sorry the staff is exceptional they want to make sure you ’re enjoying your stay. Hats off to customer service from Mary as well as Cordelia they will do Anything to make sure your stay is amazing. I ’ve got 8 rooms throughout a week span and they ’ve been greatly accommodating. Highly recommend this hotel and you ca n’t beat the rates the location and the customer service. Thank you again Mary for making this stay feel like home.

I had reserved a regular king room. When we arrived we were sent to the sister property next door and took our bags across the property. It was late and we wanted to get to the room we paid for. When we arrived next door we were put in a handicap room with a queen bed. Not at all what we reserved and paid for. We did n’t have the time or energy to complain about the situation any further.

Great Stay. The staff were friendly and helpful. Check in and check out was a breeze. Upon checking in I received a courtesy text to ensure everything was taken care of. The room and lobby were very clean. Will stay here again without hesitation.
